Literature.Title: Discovery of Biologically Optimized Polymyxin Derivatives Facilitated by Peptide Scanning and In Situ Screening Chemistry.
Literature.Author: Kaguchi R, Katsuyama A, Sato T, Takahashi S, Horiuchi M, Yokota SI, Ichikawa S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>50µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µM),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=>50µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 35667(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli SME98(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli mcr(MIC=>=256µg/ml)
